(svn_client_get_changelists): Eliminate the need for an access baton by

author: hwright
msg: Instead of conditionally creating a temporary file inside an access baton's
temp area, just use the system temp area.
(get_empty_file, apply_textdelta): Directly get a temp file in the

author: hwright
msg: Remove another unneeded access baton parameter in libsvn_client, and replace
it with the 'base_dir' argument.  The libsvn_client-private ra functions
could probably still use some massaging to make the argument lists more
(svn_client__ra_session_from_path): Use the base directory instead of the
access baton, and update the docs.
(location_from_path_and_rev): Don't open a now-unneeded access baton.

author: hwright
msg: This is *effectively* a reversion of r36720 in that it causes most Apache
servers to use "text/plain" as the default MIME type when no other can
Subversion's usability in terms of serving files directly from the
repository to a browser client.  This change restores that usability.
